requiredEquipmentExplanation: The video's title, description, and channel information all emphasize that this is a body-weight workout intended for weight loss, targeting the entire body without requiring any equipment. The phrase in the description, 'These routines are all body-weight exercises meaning you don’t need to use any equipment at all,' clearly indicates that no equipment is needed. The channel Roberta's Gym also specifies in its description that it provides 'body weight workouts and exercises,' further supporting the conclusion that no specific equipment is necessary for this workout. Therefore, the workout is intended to be performed using only body weight, requiring no additional items.
